DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date the specimen was placed in the conical tube.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._Cause to be in a certain state, relationship, or location._A shape whose base is a circle and whose sides taper up to a point._A hollow cylinder, especially one for holding or conveying liquids; anything shaped like such a hollow cylinder, e.g. an organic structure having the shape or function of a tube such as channel within a plant or animal body (e.g. fallopian tube).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: Cause to be in a certain state, relationship, or location.:A shape whose base is a circle and whose sides taper up to a point.:A hollow cylinder, especially one for holding or conveying liquids; anything shaped like such a hollow cylinder, e.g. an organic structure having the shape or function of a tube such as channel within a plant or animal body (e.g. fallopian tube).

Concepts.definition: Cause to be in a certain state, relationship, or location.
A shape whose base is a circle and whose sides taper up to a point.

A hollow cylinder, especially one for holding or conveying liquids; anything shaped like such a hollow cylinder, e.g. an organic structure having the shape or function of a tube such as channel within a plant or animal body (e.g. fallopian tube).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
